title: Research: Zero-leak enforcement strategy (GPA vs Valgrind vs hybrid)
body:
Research and decide on the memory leak detection strategy for Rusholme.

**Deliverables:**
- Decision document in docs/decisions/002-zero-leak-strategy.md
- Evaluate: Zig std.testing.allocator, GeneralPurposeAllocator in main.zig, Valgrind for C interop
- Recommend a hybrid approach with clear guidance on when each tool applies

**Design notes:**
- Zig's std.testing.allocator wraps GeneralPurposeAllocator with automatic leak detection
- Tests using it fail automatically on leak â€” no manual checks needed
- Valgrind is useful for C interop (LLVM C API) but adds CI complexity
- GPA .deinit() check in main.zig catches leaks during development runs
